title: Week 16 Matchups + Wheel of Shame, Christmas Episode - Fantasy Football Podcast for 12/24
description:
Happy Holidays! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a Christmas Eve episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 16 matchup breakdowns and injury updates. Plus, Mike spins the Wheel of Shame during the “Fantasy Faceoff” segment! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for December 24th, 2021.
  
 (02:55) - FootClan Friday
 (05:45) - NFL News
 (10:30) - Fantasy Forecast 
 (11:05) - Buccaneers at Panthers
 (17:20) - Chargers at Texans
 (22:20) - Bears at Seahawks
 (28:50) - Steelers at Chiefs
 (33:10) - Broncos at Raiders
 (37:10) - Washington Football Team at Cowboys
 (43:30) - Dolphins at Saints
 (48:20) - Fantasy Faceoff & Wheel of Shame
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube

 Check out today's sponsors:
